description: A queue represents a waiting queue for processes/clients.

arrivalTime.description: unix timestamp when client was added to the queue or appointment time

callCount.description: number of calls for the client to appear at the workstation

destination.description: Text to display on calling the queued item, usually a room number.

destinationHint.description: Small hint to display on calling the queued item.

number.description: number to display on a call display

waitingTimeEstimate.description: estimated time in minutes to wait for a call

withAppointment.description: true if corresponding process has an appointment
